author: hlship
msg: Revise and simplify the role of page recorders (form long lived objects associated with the engine to short lived objects associated with the request cycle).
Allow the strategy for persisting page properties to be pluggable, and selectable on a property-by-property basis.

author: hlship
msg: Fix some minor problems introduced by the update-copyrights script.

author: hlship
msg: Add missing copyright comments to many files
